alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:39AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow and strong northwest winds. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Northwest winds sustained at 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Wallace, Logan, Gove, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Roads may become slick. Intermittent blizzard conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Winds could strengthen to around 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph for counties near the Kansas and Colorado border.
info.instruction: Near blizzard conditions are expected within the advisory area. Travel is not advised. If you absolutely must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
